jobDescription:
Role: Full Stack Developer

Background: work includes a variety of different feature sets using API’s, Power Platform, Dataverse, and
standard C# development.  The team this individual will be joining will be able to move in between
different technologies to develop feature sets that integrate within our Dynamics instance.  It’s a lot of
Microsoft potpourri from .NET, Azure, Power Platform, and Dynamics configuration.
 
Experience: Dev I or II (2-5 years)
Technical Profile:
 .NET Generalist with strong preference for experience writing/using web services.  See above for
more detail.
 Preferred: C#, SQL, Web API, SSIS, Azure, SQL
 Nice to have: Power Platform (Power BI, Power Apps, Power Automate)
 Ok to have but not primary: SSRS, SSIS, MVC, CA Autosys, JavaScript frameworks (Angular,
React-JS, etc.)
 Experience with Test Driven Development
 Exposure to Entity Framework or other ORM
Qualities needed for any of these roles:
 Good communicator who wants to work in a team environment, comfortable performing pair
programming
 Analytical – not afraid to dive into complex code and data to troubleshoot issues
 Creative problem solver who is automation focused – we’re looking to not have recurring work
come back to us, but to better automate or teach/train users for self service
 Motivated by small quick wins and process improvement
 Comfortable working in an agile environment.  Prefer experience working in agile
Benefits to being placed at The Company:
 Long-term contract with potential for extended renewals
 Team focused environment.  We treat our consultants as part of the team.
 Rich developer community with lunch & learns on best practices.  Focus on software artisanship.
 A DevOps culture. We use automated deployment and are constantly looking to improve in the
DevOps space. Our DBAs/App Admins are part of our collaboration.
 Agile/lean practices with diversity of projects
